snippet.title: RateBeer's local star will soon taste his 10,000th
snippet.description: Washington's own "1-percenter" of beer raters will soon taste his 10,000th brew.

snippet.title: Freight train industry to miss safety deadline
snippet.description: Only one-fifth of its track will be equipped with mandatory safety technology to prevent the most catastrophic kinds of collisions and derailments by the deadline set by Congress, the freight railroad industry said Wednesday.

snippet.title: Freight train industry to miss safety deadline
snippet.description: Only one-fifth of its track will be equipped with mandatory safety technology to prevent the most catastrophic kinds of collisions and derailments by the deadline set by Congress, the freight railroad industry said Wednesday.

snippet.title: Why COSMIC-2 is a lot more than 'nice to have'
snippet.description: Last week Sen. Richard Shelby remarked that observations from the satellite constellation COSMIC-2 are only "nice to have." Nothing could be further from the truth.

snippet.title: 'You Are Here: From the Compass to GPS, the History and Future of How We Find Ourselves' by Hiawatha Bray
snippet.description: 'You Are Here' chronicles the history of global positioning and how we find out where we are.

snippet.title: Art review: 'Brink and Boundary' at the American University Museum
snippet.description: At the American University Museum, art that lurks in unexpected corners.

snippet.title: Democrats on the defensive
snippet.description: The party is diminishing faith in its own credibility.

snippet.title: House committee votes to request criminal prosecution of ex-IRS official Lois Lerner
snippet.description: Ways and Means Committee voted along party lines to refer former IRS official to the Justice Department.

snippet.title: Commentary: Locking up our opportunities
snippet.description: The region's national security agencies are where our entrepreneurial focus should be.

snippet.title: Want to check out the Cherry Blossom Festival or avoid it? Apps are your best path.
snippet.description: Many smartphone apps offer visitors guidance on driving, transit and biking to festival events.
